form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR A SEARCH OF THE RECORDS OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, NARA, 8/25/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/25/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Budget Bureau No. 43-R0104 Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR A SEARCH OF .
